content: 24/7 support via multiple channels. 1,200+ trained professionals. Trilingual (Sinhala, Tamil, English). Average response: <45 seconds.
General: 1234 (free from LankaTel). Technical: 1235. Billing: 1236 (6 AM-10 PM). Enterprise: 1237. Roaming: +94 77 123 4567. Network Issues: 1299. New Connections: 1238 (8 AM-8 PM).
Website chat: lankatel.lk/chat (24/7). WhatsApp: +94 77 123 4568. Facebook: @LankaTelSL. Twitter: @LankaTelSupport. Email: support@lankatel.lk (4-hour response). Portal: my.lankatel.lk.
Features: Check balance/usage, pay bills, change packages, report issues, track tickets, locate centers, exclusive offers. Download: Play Store/App Store.
*123# Main Menu, *123*1# Balance, *123*2# Data Balance, *123*3# Activate Data, *121# Recharge, *122# Packages, *124# VAS, *125# Account Info.
Level 1: General inquiries (80% resolved). Level 2: Technical issues (24 hours). Level 3: Complex problems (48 hours). Level 4: Management (72 hours). Final: TRC escalation.
Submit via any channel. Receive CRN (LT-YYYYMMDD-XXXXXX). Response: 2 hours. Resolution: 24-72 hours. Escalate to TRC if unresolved.
Call answer: <60s. Chat: <45s. Email: <4 hours. Complaint: 90% within 24 hours. Technician: 24 hours (urban), 48 hours (rural). Refund: 5 business days.

For FTTH, router issues, signal problems. Book: Call 1235, app, service center. Hours: 8 AM-6 PM (emergency 24/7). Free if under warranty. Charges: Router config LKR 500, Wiring LKR 1,000, Emergency LKR 2,500.
Hotline: 1230 (no wait). Personal Account Manager. Same-day field service. Lounge access (stores, airport). Free device health check. Exclusive events. Eligibility: LKR 5,000+ monthly or 5+ years.

Hotline: 1237 (24/7). Dedicated Account Manager. 4-hour SLA. Proactive monitoring. Monthly reviews. Custom reports. On-site support. Tiers: Bronze (5+ lines), Silver (20+), Gold (50+), Platinum (100+).
Sinhala, Tamil, English - all channels 24/7. Press 1 (Sinhala), 2 (Tamil), 3 (English) when calling. App/website in all languages. Sign language at flagship stores by appointment.
During disasters: Free emergency calls (110, 119, 1990). Free data in affected areas. Mobile charging at evacuation centers. Waived late fees. Emergency contact: 1299 or +94 77 199 9999.
Phone (1234): 24/7. Technical (1235): 24/7. Billing (1236): 6 AM-10 PM. Enterprise (1237): 24/7. Live Chat: 24/7. Social Media: 6 AM-12 AM. Service Centers: Mon-Fri 8:30 AM-5:30 PM, Sat 9 AM-2 PM.
Format: LT-YYYYMMDD-XXXXXX. Track via app, my.lankatel.lk, SMS 'STATUS [Ticket]' to 1234, call 1234. Statuses: OPEN, IN PROGRESS, PENDING, RESOLVED, CLOSED. Auto-escalation if SLA exceeded.
Request via: Press 1 in queue, SMS 'CALLBACK' to 1234, app, website. Callback within 30 min (peak) or 2 hours (off-peak). VIP priority. Reduces wait times.

50+ nationwide. Major: Colombo Fort, Kandy City, Galle, Negombo, Jaffna. Services: New connections, bill payment, SIM, plan changes, technical support. Hours: Mon-Fri 8:30 AM-5:30 PM, Sat 9 AM-2 PM. Find nearest via app or 1234.
Book via app > Service Centers > Book Appointment. Select service, date, time. SMS confirmation. Arrive 5 min before. Benefits: No waiting, guaranteed time. Available 7 days in advance.
Available 24/7 for router/device issues. Call 1235. Services: Step-by-step guidance, screen sharing, remote router config. Free. Not for hardware issues or outages.
Access: lankatel.lk/help, MyLankaTel app > Help. Searchable FAQ, step-by-step guides, video tutorials, troubleshooting articles. Sinhala, Tamil, English. Mobile-optimized.
